message: I understand you want a fair split, but the value of the money decreases rapidly for you.  This offer ensures you get a good deal while there's still significant value.
Considering the inflation, this is a more reasonable split

I won't go below 60% considering the rapid value loss I'm experiencing
Alice, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. You're losing money much faster than me! This is my final offer above 5000.
